驠驠驠

驠字的基本解释

驠
yàn
屁股毛色白的马。

驠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》於甸切，去霰，影。］
［《廣韻》烏前切，平先，影。］
白臀的马。

驠字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驠； 康熙笔画：26； 页码：页1446第37
【廣韻】【集韻】?伊甸切，音宴。【玉篇】馬白州也。【爾雅·釋畜註】州，竅也。謂馬白尻者名驠。　又【廣韻】烏前切【集韻】因蓮切，?音煙。義同。　【正字通】按伯樂相馬，亦言白州，獨山海經，倫山之熊如麋，其川在尾上。註：川，竅也。據此說，州當作川，川能流通，故與竅義合。凡作州者，皆川之誤，如水牛老牛之名州留，或方言，非一類，又不必改州留爲川留也。字彙以州爲尻，非。

驠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
驠字的起名意思

暂无。

驠
Basic explanation of words
驠
yàn
A horse with a white coat.
驠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàn］
["Guangyun" Yu Dian cut, go to hail, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Wuqianqie, Pingxian, shadow. ]
White rump horse.
驠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　驠; Kangxi Strokes: 26; Page Number: Page 1446 Page 37
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Eden cut, sound feast. [Jade articles] Ma Baizhou also. [Erya Shihu Note] Zhou, Qiaoye. The name of Ma Baijiri is called 驠.　[Guangyun] Wuqianqi [Jiyun] Because of lotus cutting, sound smoke. The same meaning.　【Zhengzitong】According to Bole Xiangma, Baizhou, Dushan Haijing, Lunshan bears are like moose, and its river is on the tail. Note: Chuan, Qiao also. According to this, the state is regarded as a river, and the river can circulate, so it is in harmony with the meaning. Anyone who is a state is mistaken by Chuan. For example, the name of Buffalo Lao Niu is Zhouliu, or the dialect is not the same, and there is no need to change the state to Chuanliu. The vocabulary is based on the state, not the state.
